website_summaries.verdict: The Saucony Showdown is a running shoe that’s touted as a high-performance sprint spike. With its componentry, runners can expect an explosive performance on the tracks. Its engineering promotes ample support, comfort, and grip—integral in generating superb speed to beat the competition. All of these qualities are stored in an ultra-light platform at an affordable price.
pros: A lot of the runners claim that the Saucony Showdown is very comfortable
It offers ample support, commended quite a few purchasers
According to a number of buyers, the track spike has a good fit
The shoe delivers superior traction, remarked several users
Many laud the featherlight composition of the track running shoe
Some reviewers hail the flexibility of the running spike
cons: Some testers state that track shoe lacks durability
There are a few athletes stating the sprint shoe lacks protection

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding Quality Short Sprints Shoe!
customer_reviews.text: This is a superb track shoe for short sprints. The design, fit, and quality were all outstanding. They came with extra laces, 1/4" metal pyramid spikes, a spike wrench, and a great carrying bag. The bag has an inner zippered pouch for the extra laces, spikes, and wrench. The shoes have 10 spikes and a stiff sole, both of which are designed for sprints of 100m or less. On sprints with a turn, such as the 200, a shoe with a more flexible sole should be used.
customer_reviews.author: L. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Prepare to be a cheetah
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are very specialized for high speeds, the design is specifically made sprinting and nothing else, with the spikes on you can't jog or walk comfortably, but at high speeds, it goes really well with the dynamics of the body. It's small and the bottom of the shoe is very close to the size of the sole of your foot, it fits tight, it's very light, and has traction from hell. I use them in an indoor track and I feel these shoes are actually taking me dangerously fast.
customer_reviews.author: Abdullah

customer_reviews.title: " This is a quality track shoe that provides superior traction because of the 10 spike configuration and the ...
customer_reviews.text: In preparation for the Senior Olympics in Tennessee I purchased the "Showdown Track Spike Racing Shoes." This is a quality track shoe that provides superior traction because of the 10 spike configuration and the rigid bottom. The shoes fits and performs as advertised. About a month before purchasing this shoe I bought the Saucony "Velocity track spike shoe" which is also a quality shoe and much less expensive. The Velocity has a 7 spike configuration and the bottom of the shoe has some cushioning. I plan to use the Showdowns for shorter sprints (50M, 100M, 200M, & 400M) and will use the Velocites for the 800M and 1500M races.
customer_reviews.author: Ray Hatch

customer_reviews.title: Did not last a full season
customer_reviews.text: These were fine while they lasted, but the sole detached from the upper within 2 1/2 months - at the last track meet of the season - during the finals - right in the middle of a race. Had to duct tape them together to finish the meet.
customer_reviews.author: Lisam

customer_reviews.title: Great Spike
customer_reviews.text: This spike is a top of the line spike. The ten pin configuration ensures that your foot never slips, even on cinder and dirt tracks. The actual shoe itself is very comfortable to wear and the tongue is nonexistent because the whole shoe just wraps around your foot. The spike plate is also very great and gives great response to your foot striking the ground. The laces are connected to straps which wrap around the bottom of the spike in a way similar to the Nike Flywire but more wide and not a wire at all. All in all a very great spike for a top grade athlete.
customer_reviews.author: dogsonw

customer_reviews.title: Great Spikes
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my teenage son. He tried these on along with the Nike Zoom Superfly R4. Both felt good and similar but he liked these better. He likes how the tongue of the shoe is not a separate piece but is part of the shoe so feels more like a sock. He hasn't raced in them yet but tested them out at the track the other day and liked them a lot.
customer_reviews.author: K. Pedersen

customer_reviews.title: Pure Comfort
customer_reviews.text: My son runs hurdles & loves how the shoe hugs his foot. No sliding or shifting as he runs. Has had trouble with ingrown toe nails in past, but not worried this season. Comfort all around the foot!
customer_reviews.author: Christina M Schneider

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic sprint shoe especially for the price
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic sprint shoe especially for the price. Love the 10 spike option with a lower heel height in the back. Gives great support and holds the foot in proper sprint position. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: inthemiddle

customer_reviews.title: Great track shoe
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my son who runs track. He really likes them and how snug they fit to his feet
customer_reviews.author: Vlady

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: actually not a bad track spike I bought them for my son, and he loves them thus far.
customer_reviews.author: ADRIEN

customer_reviews.title: My son loves this track shoe look
customer_reviews.text: This track shoe was bought for my 14 year old who runs AAU track this summer. He runs 100 m and 200 m. He loves the look and the shoe. He wants me to buy another pair in another color for track. He doesn't wear them for regular running. He will use them for his sprints.
customer_reviews.author: SSR

customer_reviews.title: A great spike!
customer_reviews.text: i got these for my 6th grade son he made the middle school track team and he loves them. everyone on the team has asked him about them. he said that they are light weight and comfortable very easy to run in! and i recieved them in no time!!
customer_reviews.author: brandy alexander

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME!!!
customer_reviews.text: Fits true to size. Nice and snug, but not to tight. The plate on them are really good for the 60m to the 200m.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Sarabia

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Track Shoes
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my son who decided to join track again. He skipped last year. He states that these are very nice. He left them at home, then remembered that he had a track meet that afternoon, he figured he would just skip the running for this one meet, well the coach had different plans and loaned him a pair of track shoes. He said that evening that he won't forget his own shoes again, his feet were so sore and he didn't do very well. He has improved his personal best from year before last.
customer_reviews.author: katdaz

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Running Shoes
customer_reviews.text: MY 16-YEAR OLD REALLY LIKE THESE SHOES AND USES THEM IN HIGH SCHOOL TRACK. ALTHOUGH HE WAS LATER TOLD TO GET SHOES WITH SPIKES, HE STILL MOSTLY USED THESE SHOES.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Levine

customer_reviews.title: Above average track shoe
customer_reviews.text: This shoe is good for the price. It is not the greatest out here but it served me well when I had it. If I were to choose now, I would most likely go with a differnet shoe because it rubbed the inside of my foot wrong. But this is purlely personal.
customer_reviews.author: mak

customer_reviews.title: Saucony Showdown
customer_reviews.text: Bought these early in the season, after my Nikes physically blew apart. They are great, feel really light, very quiet and get me up and forward through the hips. Being older (40+) this is important. Having the shroud provides a level of security also. I have a very wide foot with a narrow heel, and the versatile lacing options catered perfectly. I use them for 60m through to 400m, and LJ. In LJ they felt like being in bare feet, and I'm not sure if it was my time or the shoes, but I started jumping consistently 30cm further. For 400m they keep me up on my toes for the full lap, (not easy at my age).
customer_reviews.author: Dave

product_meta.title: Saucony Showdown 3 Running Spikes
product_meta.description: Saucony Showdown 3 Running Spikes Blink and you'll miss it. The Showdown is a lightweight high-end sprint spike that uses our revolutionary ISOFIT lacing system to morph to your foot for a sock-like feel. ISOFIT Upper The upper of the Showdown 3 is where Saucony have really worked their magic, totally revamping the fit and weight, whilst improving support and comfort! The long awaited introduction of Saucony's ISOFIT technology into their performance track footwear doesn't disappoint. The ISOFIT lockdown system overlaid onto an incredibly lightweight Flexifilm synthetic mesh results in a sock-like fit which hugs to the contours and shape of the foot whilst providing amazing support and lockdown onto the plate. Breathable, supportive, lightweight and comfortable, the fit of the Showdown 3 means that there will be no movement of the foot within the shoe, allowing optimal power output. Midsole To keep the weight of the shoe down, and the runner as light as possible, Saucony have used no additional cushioning technologies in this shoe. So the bulk of the work is done by the upper and the outsole to maintain high levels of performance. 10-Spike Pin Plate Outsole Continuing to utilise an aggressive 10 spike pin plate construction, the Showdown 3 provides unrivalled traction in the world of sprint spikes, promoting maximal power output from the blocks with no chance of slipping and lost momentum. Absolute confidence can be assured with every stride in the Showdown 3, guaranteeing performance to your outright potential. The full length Pebax plate in the Showdown 3 hasn't changed much in configuration and appearance from the seriously successful Showdown 2, though on closer inspection it becomes evident that Saucony have trimmed down on the bulk, without compromising on rigidity and support, considerably reducing the weight of the outsole with no detriment to the spikes performance. Overall this results in a strong and dynamic platform with incredible traction
